content.text: What is the stiffness matrix for this part of the groove structure?

The highlighted section suggests an entrance at the left-bottom of the structure. This necessitates high stiffness along the Z-axis and low stiffness in the X and Y directions.

### Stiffness Matrix
```json
{
  "stiffness_matrix": [
    [100, 0, 0],
    [0, 100, 0],
    [0, 0, 250]
  ]
}
```
